A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this is easily the worst Star Wars Movie ever made. Disney decided to create new abilities that were really reaching in this flick. As a reader of the books\, cannon and non cannon\, as well as the comics\, I thought this was something totally different from what star wars is. Too many holes\, I have more questions\, and dialogue was horrible. No character development and there were characters that I didn't know why they were there. completely disappointed.
